ReferenceData.String:
FILE OPTIONS
-f <path/to/long/trajectory/name.xtc> (Input) File name option with a long value -f2 <path/to/long/trajectory.xtc> (Input) File name option with a long value -lib <path/to/long/trajectory/name.xtc> (Input, Opt., Lib.) File name option with a long value and type -longfileopt <deffile.dat> (Input, Opt.) File name option with a long name -longfileopt2 <path/to/long/file/name.dat> (Input, Opt., Lib.) File name option with multiple long fields
